name: Kraken Madness
description:
Ahoy, captain !

You found yourself far away from the coast, surrounded by those dangerous krakens !  Ready the guns and brace for the fight, because there is no way left to escape. So put on your peg leg, sing a last shanty and go hunt those beasts from the depths !

Do not hesitate to leave your best score or any thougts in the comments, we'll see who's the best buccaneer around !

Use WASD or the arrow keys to move your ship and the mouse to shoot cannonballs at your foes.

*The font of the In-game title comes from MediBang Paint Pro.
